title: Eder Kurti
text:
Eder Kurti (born 29 October 1984) is a British Professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> with <a href="Albanians">Albanian</a> heritage who competes in the supper middleweight division currently residing in <a href="Woolwich%2C%20London">Woolwich, London</a>.
Kurti turned pro in 2004 and in June 2010 Kurti was a reserve for the Super-Middleweights prizefighter competition at York Hall, Bethnal Green.
Alongside flyweight <a href="Ashley%20Sexton">Ashley Sexton</a>, Kurti is trained by Paul Reese at the Monster Gym in Cheshunt and is managed by London Promoter Michael Helliet.
On St George's day, 23 April 2009, Eder Kurti defeated Mark Phillips at a Dinner Show hosted by the <a href="Mayfair%20Sporting%20Club">Mayfair Sporting Club</a> at the Milenium Hotel in Mayfair.
On 11 September at the York Hall Kurti won by KO against ‘Dangerous’ Danny Goode who failed to beat the count after being floored by a right hand to the body in the third round.
